page.title: 05People of Ufton - Attitudes
page.content: {Newcomers:} The new people find the neighbours very friendly & easy to get on with,they all join in the community events and find the community spirit friendly & warm.One of the new comers described Ufton as, a man's village because most of the activities are for men but overall they find the village extremely friendly. {Farmers:} The farmers like the freedom & find that there is nothing to be tied to.They find the community spirit is good & the people are friendly. Ufton is a homely area & contact between farms is good. {Original Residents:}These people find the community spirit good & they are involved in lots of activities.They find the new residents very friendly & they are glad to have them around.
